item.title: Senior Software Engineer - PHP
item.description:
• Lead development of enterprise PHP/Symfony applications for 50,000+ users.
  • Built React & Svelte applications using TypeScript with optimized performance.
  • Architected REST APIs and microservices using Symfony API Platform.
  • Reduced deployment time by 35% by implementing microservice architecture.
  • Designed CI/CD pipelines (GitLab CI), reducing release time from 2 weeks to 3 days.
  • Containerized systems using Docker ensuring 40% fewer environment issues.
  • Implemented Kubernetes-based infrastructure achieving 99.7% uptime.
  • Built automation tools using Node.js saving 15+ developer hours/week.
  • Optimized DB queries & caching (Redis, Varnish) improving performance by 50%.
  • Mentored junior developers & contributed to architecture decisions.
  • Ensured secure API development using JWT/OAuth.
  • Developed custom WordPress themes, plugins & CMS modules.
  • Monitored system health using New Relic, Kibana & Grafana.
